Data input for teal app

dataset.Rd

Abstract function that creates dataset object with connected metadata.

dataset(
  dataname,
  data,
  keys = list(primary = NULL, foreign = NULL, parent = NULL)
)

Arguments

dataname

name of dataset
data

data
keys

list of keys -

Please note that the order of keys is important.

Keys are not matched by name but by order. In case you want to perform:

SELECT ... FROM ADSL LEFT JOIN ADTTE on ADTTE.STUDYID = ADSL.STUDYID and ADTTE.SUBJECTUNIQUEID = ADSL.USUBJID

the keys need to be

ADSL primary: USUBJID, STUDYID

ADTTE primary: PARAMCD, foreign: SUBJECTUNIQUEID, STUDYID, parent: ADSL

As you can see the names of foreign ADTTE are different to ADSL keys, but the order and length is equal.

Value

a dataset with connected metadata

Examples

library(random.cdisc.data)

ADSL <-  suppressWarnings(radsl(N = 600, seed = 123))

dataset("ADSL", ADSL)
#> $dataname
#> [1] "ADSL"
#> 
#> $data
#> # A tibble: 600 x 31
#>    STUDYID USUBJID SUBJID SITEID   AGE SEX   RACE  COUNTRY INVID ARM   ARMCD
